author: Sallie Ann Burnett
text: A member government is looking for information relating to a "Citizen of the Month" program where Council members nominate a citizen to be recognized for outstanding public service or other contributions. If you have such a program, please share details of the criteria and process used in the selection process. If you previously had a program and have discontinued same please share the challenges that you experienced that made you decide to discontinue the program.
title: Citizen of the Month Program
